title: The Sevens Tournament Quick! Quick! Quick!
brief_description: Teams from 16 countries including such unlikely contesters as West Samoa, Spain, USA, Japan, South Korea, Holland, Tonga, Romania and Canada, as well as England, Wales, France, Argentina, Fiji, New Zealand and Australia fight it out for the inaugural title. Rated: G
